name: Eye of Silver
description:
CONTROLS: WASD to move around, R to restart the battle, and E to quit to the main menu. 

Greetings, this is the submission between me and cashwarrior1 - itch.io for the Bullet Hell Game Jam 2021. The theme is 10 seconds, so the gun fires every ten seconds.

Leave feedback please, it is highly appreciated : ) 

Check out cashwarrior here, he made the soundtrack:

https://www.youtube.com/user/cashwarior/videos

https://nmatthiash.bandcamp.com/

https://twitter.com/cashwarior1

Hope you enjoy this entry of ours.
